name: The Lost and The Wicked
description:
The Lost and The Wicked is a Brutal Twin-Stick Psycho-Thriller. You wake up surrounded by strange creatures, confused with no memory of your past. Explore and fight your way through the world, defeating monsters and bosses to uncover more about this place, who you are, and how you got here. Are you lost or are you wicked?

Full original soundtrack "The L O. S. T." will be available for purchase soon!

Story

The calm before the storm... Discover your past, who you are, where you came from... wait how did you get here? What are these creatures?

Gameplay

The wicked get faster, stronger and deadlier... but so does your arsenal. Unlock weapons and abilities as you continue on your journey and discover your past.

Bosses

These creatures seem stronger than the rest. The wicked speaks... Fight unique bosses and increase your strength in the process.
